On Tue, 9 Mar 2010, 14:13, Noah Levitt wrote:

> Since you are calling shutdown, you could also poll/wait until heritrix is gone. By then you can be sure it's finished
> writing out the reports.

Really? It is my experience that Heritrix (1.x) is not always able to 
create the reports if a job is ended by shutdown. This may also happen if 
a job is ended by terminateCurrentJob and shutdown follows too fast after.

In the past, we had a lot of jobs with missing reports on our production 
system. So we began to delay the shutdown after terminateCurrentJob (up to 
several minutes for big jobs) to let Heritrix write the reports to disk.

Even now, reports are not created in some cases, but it's much less than 
before.

Best,
   Bert
